export const selectIsAuthenticated=state=>state.auth.isAuthenticated;export const selectUser=state=>state.auth.user;export const selectToken=state=>state.auth.token;export const selectAuthLoading=state=>state.auth.loading;export const selectAuthError=state=>state.auth.error;export default authSlice.reducer;
